metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12874 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The InfoCard module 1.0 for SimpleSAMLphp allows attackers to spoof XML messages by leveraging an incorrect check of return values in signature validation utilities.

notes.Note: sbeattie> according to debian, issue lies in simplesamlphp/simplesamlphp-module-infocard and fixed in module version 1.0.1. The module is embedded in simplesamlphp.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.15-1').
